roleset.name: unsecure/release a boat from the dock
roleset.note: UNDOCKING-N NOTES: Added by Julia for EWT.

example.name: undock-v
example.text: The 3 girls sat on the ledge while the 3 boys raised the sails and undocked the boat from the pier.

example.name: undocking-n
example.text: The Chinese program 's second phase will include spacewalks on future missions and demonstrations of docking and undocking techniques .
